name: AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode
desc: Constants that describe the video stabilization modes that the device and format support.

items.name: case off
items.desc: A mode that doesnâ€™t stablize video capture.

items.name: case standard
items.desc: A video stabilization mode that uses the standard algorithm.

items.name: case cinematic
items.desc: A video stabilization mode that uses the cinematic stabilization algorithm.

items.name: case cinematicExtended
items.desc: A video stabilization mode that uses the extended cinematic stabilization algorithm.

items.name: case auto
items.desc: The system chooses most appropriate video stabilization mode for the device and format.
